title: A discovery of the groundlesness and insincerity of my Ld. of Down's Dissuasive being The fourth appendix to Svre-footing : with a letter to Dr. Casaubon, and another to his answerer / by J.S.
author: Sergeant, John, 1622-1707.
notes: Wing apparently in error in dating this 1675.
Also issued as a part of the second edition of Sure-footing in Christianity (Wing, S2596).
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
